description: Made for comfort, these chairs are made with steel legs, fine Swedish leather and soft suede to make every moment sat down an experience you wont want to leave.

name: Isvandrare
description: Sturdy and stylish. Made for office environments to spice up your work time. Comes in a variety of colors as well as different shades of wood.

name: Segelskepp
description: Lightweight, versalite comfort. The Segelskepp is a crossroad of form meets function. Winner of style award at the Scandinavian furniture awards 2020.

name: Outforskad
description: Made to impress. Outforskad is made from the finest Scandinavian mahogany you can find. Our expert crafters have designed and built this chair for ultimate pleasure and aesthetic.
